SELECT A.KNWLDG_ID KNO_ID , A.KNWLDG_NM KNO_NM , C.ORGNZT_NM ORGNZT_NM , B.KNWLDG_TY_NM KNO_TYPE_NM , D.USER_NM USER_NM , DATE_FORMAT(A.EVL_DE,'%Y-%m-%d') APP_YMD , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID FRST_REGISTER_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') FRST_REGIST_PNTTM , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID LAST_UPDUSR_ID , DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') LAST_UPDT_PNTTM FROM COMTNDAMKNOIFM A, COMTNDAMMAPKNO B, COMTNDAMMAPTEAM C, COMVNUSERMASTER D WHERE C.ORGNZT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID AND A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE = B.KNWLDG_TY_CODE AND A.FRST_REGISTER_ID = D.ESNTL_ID AND A.OTHBC_AT = 'Y' AND A.KNWLDG_EVL = '1'
AND binary(A.KNWLDG_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND binary(D.USER_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
LIMIT #{recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{firstIndex}

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM COMTNDAMKNOIFM A, COMTNDAMMAPKNO B, COMTNDAMMAPTEAM C, COMVNUSERMASTER D WHERE C.ORGNZT_ID = B.ORGNZT_ID AND A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE = B.KNWLDG_TY_CODE AND A.FRST_REGISTER_ID = D.ESNTL_ID AND A.OTHBC_AT = 'Y' AND A.KNWLDG_EVL = '1'
AND binary(A.KNWLDG_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')
AND binary(D.USER_NM) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT C.ORGNZT_NM orgnztNm , C.ORGNZT_ID orgnztId , B.KNWLDG_TY_NM knoTypeNm , B.KNWLDG_TY_CODE knoTypeCd , A.KNWLDG_ID knoId , A.KNWLDG_NM knoNm , A.KNWLDG_CN knoCn , E.USER_NM userNm , A.OTHBC_AT othbcAt , A.ATCH_FILE_ID atchFileId , DATE_FORMAT(A.EVL_DE,'%Y-%m-%d') appYmd , (select a.user_nm from COMVNUSERMASTER a, COMTNDAMKNOIFM b where a.ESNTL_ID = b.EXPERT_ID and b.KNWLDG_ID = #{knoId}) speNm , A.DSUSE_DE junkYmd , A.KNWLDG_EVL knoAps , D.AUTHOR_CODE authorCode , A.FRST_REGISTER_ID frstRegisterId , DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') frstRegisterPnttm , A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID lastUpdusrId , DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,'%Y-%m-%d') lastUpdusrPnttm FROM COMTNDAMKNOIFM A, COMTNDAMMAPKNO B, COMTNDAMMAPTEAM C, COMTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS D, COMVNUSERMASTER E WHERE B.ORGNZT_ID = C.ORGNZT_ID AND A.KNWLDG_TY_CODE = B.KNWLDG_TY_CODE AND A.FRST_REGISTER_ID = E.ESNTL_ID AND A.OTHBC_AT = 'Y' AND A.KNWLDG_ID = #{knoId} AND D.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{emplyrId}
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNDAMKNOIFM SET DSUSE_DE = #{junkYmd} , KNWLDG_EVL = #{knoAps} , LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId} , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = sysdate() WHERE OTHBC_AT = 'Y' AND KNWLDG_ID = #{knoId}
